summary: Video game adventurer Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.
cast: Angelina Jolie|Jon Voight|Iain Glen|Noah Taylor|Daniel Craig|Richard Johnson|Chris Barrie|Julian Rhind-Tutt|Leslie Phillips|Robert Phillips|Rachel Appleton|Henry Wyndham|David Cheung|David Tse|Ozzie Yue|Wai-Keat Lau|Carl Chase|Olegar Fedoro|Richenda Carey|Sylvano Clarke|Ayla Amiral|Stephanie Burns|Anna-Maria Everett|Gary Bunn|Sonny Caldinez|Steve Darts|Ray Donn|James Embree|Aidan Harrington|Jon Ioannou|Prince Thompson Iyamu|Jimmy Roussounis
title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
